(Apologies for not having created eight different B/S/T posts, one for each card.)

Polar Bear Devore, SGC 50/4, SOLD

Polar Bear Bliss, raw, SOLD

Prices are delivered within the United States. Regular PayPal is fine. No need to "gift" your payment.

A commitment to buy takes precedence over an ongoing negotiation.  :rolleyes:

Feel free to [URL="wolfie51sb@aol.com"]email any questions[/URL] or requests for larger scans.

Thanks,

Rob

[URL="wolfie51sb@aol.com"]wolfie51sb at aol.com [/URL]
